contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|penthouse}} '''Penthouse''' may refer to: *[[Penthouse apartment]], a special apartment on the top floor of a building *[[Penthouse (magazine)|''Penthouse'' (magazine)]], a men's magazine *[[Penthouse (film)|''Penthouse'' (film)]], a 1933 film starring Warner Baxter and Myrna Loy *''[[The Penthouse]]'', a 1967 film starring Suzy Kendall and Terence Morgan *[[The Penthouse (2010 film)|''The Penthouse'' (2010 film)]], a 2010 film starring [[Rider Strong]] *[[Penthouse (album)|''Penthouse'' (album)]], an album by Luna *[[The Penthouse Club]], Australian TV variety programme {{disambig}}
